aiofauna.faunadb.errors module

Error types that methods in the FaunaDB client throw.

exception aiofauna.faunadb.errors.BadRequest(request_result)[source]

Bases: HttpError

HTTP 400 error.

class aiofauna.faunadb.errors.ErrorData(code, description, position, failures, cause=None)[source]

Bases: object

Data for one error returned by the server.

cause

List of all Failure objects returned by the server.

None unless code == “validation failed”.

code

Error code. See all error codes here.

description

Error description.

failures

Cause of the error. May be None.

static from_dict(dct, request_result)[source]
static get_cause(dct, request_result)[source]
static get_failures(dct, request_result)[source]
position

Position of the error in a query. May be None.

class aiofauna.faunadb.errors.Failure(code, description, field)[source]

Bases: object

Part of the failures of an ErrorData.

See the Invalid Data section of the docs.

code

Failure code.

description

Failure description.

field

Field of the failure in the instance.

static from_dict(dct, request_result)[source]
exception aiofauna.faunadb.errors.FaunaError(description, request_result)[source]

Bases: Exception

Error returned by the FaunaDB server.

For documentation of error types, see the docs.

static raise_for_status_code(request_result)[source]
request_result

RequestResult for the request that caused this error.
